member.name: GLOBALOPT_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Identifies process-global options that you can set or query by using the interface.

member.name: GLOBALOPT_PROPERTIES.COMGLB_APPID
member.summary: Sets the AppID for the process.

member.name: GLOBALOPT_PROPERTIES.COMGLB_RPC_THREADPOOL_SETTING
member.summary: Sets the thread-pool behavior of the RPC runtime in the process.

member.name: GLOBALOPT_PROPERTIES.COMGLB_UNMARSHALING_POLICY
member.summary: Defines the policy that's applied in the function.
